thread.title: Festival of Lights brightens up London's streets

title: Festival of Lights brightens up London's streets
text:
Festival of Lights brightens up London's streets Friday, January 19, 2018 - 00:55 
Lumiere London has opened in England's capital. It features a range of publically displayed works that use light as a medium. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Lumiere London has opened in England's capital. It features a range of publically displayed works that use light as a medium. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DoMkuZ
